Description_lang: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by $s2% and reduces its cooldown by |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1 sec|r.

description_blz.en_US: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by 20% and reduces its cooldown by 2.0 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Escudo del honrado extiende un 20% la duración de Defensor candente y reduce 2.0 s su tiempo de reutilización.
description_blz.pt_BR: Escudo do Íntegro aumenta em 20% a duração do Defensor Ardente e reduz a recarga dele em 2,0 s.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Schild der Rechtschaffenen' verlängert die Dauer von 'Unermüdlicher Verteidiger' um 20% und verringert dessen Abklingzeit um 2,0 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by 20% and reduces its cooldown by 2.0 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Escudo del honrado prolonga un 20% la duración de Defensor candente y reduce su tiempo de reutilización 2,0 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Bouclier du vertueux augmente la durée de Défenseur fervent de 20% et réduit son temps de recharge de 2,0 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Scudo del Virtuoso estende la durata di Fervido Difensore del 20% e ne riduce il tempo di recupero di 2,0 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Щит праведника" продлевает действие "Ревностного защитника" на 20% и сокращает его время восстановления на 2,0 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 정의의 방패가 헌신적인 수호자의 지속시간을 20%만큼 증가시키고 재사용 대기시간은 2.0초만큼 감소시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 公正之盾會使忠誠防衛者的持續時間延長20%，並使其冷卻時間縮短2.0秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 正义盾击可以使炽热防御者的持续时间延长20%，并使其冷却时间缩短2.0秒。
